commonEmailFileExtensions

This function allows you to get an array of common text file extensions with or without the dot

Type:Function
Status:stable
Since:1.0.0
Platform:jsnode
@lotsof.sugar.shared.extension

Params

  1. withDot*-Boolean

    If true, the dot will be added to the extension

Return

  1. -Array<String>

    The array of extensions

Example

import { __commonEmailFileExtensions } from '@lotsof/sugar/extension';
const extensions = __commonEmailFileExtensions();

Author
